ygData.subject: Re: Reply to accusation that Verant isn't effective.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry Gabriel, the closing remark was not directed at you. I misplaced an expression of my frustration with all of the posts trashing Verant, trashing the
ygData.messageBody:
>The
>complaining about everything under the sun was a little misdirected,
>however. Like the majority of my post said, I am happy with Verant.
>

Sorry Gabriel, the closing remark was not directed at you. I
misplaced an expression of my frustration with all of the posts
trashing Verant, trashing the Soerbairds, trashing individual
posters, and everything else under the sun. Nearly all of it totally
misplaced.

IMHO EQ is the most awesome online game I have ever encountered and I
am appalled at how people will whine even when a company is as
responsive to it's customer's concerns as Verant has been so far. I
played Meridian 59 for years at 3 times the cost and 3DO was totally
UNresponsive to it's customers concerns. The UO staff was nearly as
bad.

Gee, I am sorry that I'm not following the crowd, but I actually
appreciate Verant. (Again, these comments are not directed at you,
Gabriel, you seem have a good head on your shoulders) :0)

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
